title: Jax is, without a doubt, an anti-fun champ to play against.
body:
* 3,000 HP minimum. (level 18)
* Three hits anyone who doesn't have the same HP as him.
* AoE stun which also denies auto attack damage.
* Gap closer on a 3 - 4 second cooldown.
* Can ward jump.
* Decent base stats.
* Scales amazingly.
* Hybrid damage, hard to counter.

Now let's look at his cons.

* Bad early game.

replies.body:
\>jax
\>anti fun
lmao nah, not in his current state.
With the items he buys he will hit 3k health.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=m0wKi0jn,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-16T11:24:19.529+0000)
>
> You said minimum his minimum level 18 is 2038 deal with it.

I forgot that you have the IQ of a snail. with items. a level 18 Jax will have a full build or at least 3k HP with his core items, which all give HP or defensive stats + damage.

You are really slow, i don't give a fuck about his items he could have 6 warmogs for all i care, but the point of face is his base hp is 2038 so therefore his minimum hp at level 18 is literally 2038, a jax doesnt need hp items to have a viable build, he just needs onhit, hybrid, attackspeed and armor/mr hp is just a niche that comes with his needed stats

>Bad early game.

(Assuming your one of his counters)

Seriously though, he doesn't have that bad of an early game, unless you play something that specifically counters him.
Fun champ for a top main like me
